text: emi? Ayana (allah), prati vyakti arjince danini kanipettukoni undevadu (mariyu labhanastalu kalugajeyaleni mi butakapu daivalu sarisamanula)? Ayina varu allah ku bhagasvamulu (sati) kalpistaru. Varito ila anu: "(Nijangane varu allah svayanga niyamincukunna bhagasvamule ayite) vari perlanu telupandi! Leka bhumilo unnatlu ayanaku teliyani visayanni miru ayanaku teluputunnara? Leka miru itle notiki vaccinatlu vagutunnara? Vastavaniki, satyanni tiraskarincina variki, vari kutra akarsaniyanga ceyabadutondi. Mariyu varu rjumargam nundi nirodhincacabaddaru. Mariyu allah margabhrastatvanlo vadalina vaniki sanmargam cupevadu evvadu undadu
